CodeBlockMethod.Name: DoubleJump
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local rigidbody = self.Entity.RigidbodyComponent local controller = self.Entity.PlayerControllerappend
if controller.LookDirectionX > 0 then rigidbody:SetForce(Vector2(6,6)) else rigidbody:SetForce(Vector2(-6,6)) end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if (key == KeyboardKey.LeftAlt) then if(self.leave_ground == false) then self.leave_ground = true elseif(self.doublejumpable) then self.doublejumpable = false self:DoubleJump() end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleFootholdEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity local Foothold = event.Foothold -------------------------------------------------------- if(Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.leave_ground = false

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleFootholdLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity local Foothold = event.Foothold -------------------------------------------------------- if(Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.doublejumpable = true
